features: AREDS 2 Eye Support & Vision Vitamins: Our eye health supplement was crafted by experts to ensure optimal eye health support. Contains clinically proven Lutemax (lutein), Zeaxanthin, Bilberry extract, and Vitamin C, E, B12, Folate, Zinc, & Copper

Eye Health Support: As we get older, it's essential to take care of our eyes. Our Areds2 Formula aids in support of overall eye health, eye strain, dry eyes, & protection from blue light. All of these benefits in 2 easy to take veggie caps

Combat Eye Fatigue: The B.L.U.E. Study showed carotenoids from Lutemax have positive effects on vision health, sleep quality, and can reduce occasional eye strain from long exposure to blue light screens. Our formula has all 3 macular carotenoids

Optimal Lutein & Zeaxanthin Ratio: Contains Lutein 20 mg and Zeaxanthin 4 mg in the heavily studied 5:1 ratio in the form of Lutemax. Ideal for supporting eye health, dry eyes, & vision. Contains Black Pepper Extract for enhanced absorption

Safety Assured Standard of Quality: Our eye health vitamins are 3rd-party tested for purity and manufactured in the USA using imported and domestic ingredients in a cGMP compliant facility. NO: added soy, gluten, milk, egg, wheat, peanuts, shellfish

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clear Vision, Clear Results Physician’s Choice Eye Health Supplement is made with ingredients based on the well-known AREDS 2 (Age-Related Eye Disease Study 2), along with patented and award-winning Lutemax 2020 to support healthy eyes and maintain healthy vision.*

A Sight for Sore Eyes Blue Light is Unavoidable Our eyes go through a lot during the average day.The ingredients in our Eye Health Supplement can help reduce the negative impact of our eyes' daily exposures.* Maintain Healthy Vision with Age 1 in 3 Americans will face some kind of reduction in quality of vision by age 65.Our Eye Health Supplement blend contains ingredients that are shown to promote vision quality, even as we age.* No More Itchy Eyes Common environmental factors can affect how well our eyes see and physically feel. In addition to improving vision quality, our Eye Health Supplement helps promote and maintain eye moisture.*

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eye Health is a good product.
reviews.reviewText: I stare at a computer screen 10 hours a day and sometimes all night. I need good eye health. Eye Health works great and is easy to swallow. I get have my eyes checked yearly and the eye Dr she says my eyes look great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I rate this item by how it works on my dry eyes
reviews.reviewText: I love this product, I have ordered this item 3 times and my sister ordered the first one for me. I have eye problems and can see well and my eyes are dry, dry, dry. This item keeps me from using eye drops in my eyes all the time. I recommend this to people with dry eyes.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Areds 2 eye vitamins
reviews.reviewText: My eye doctor recommended Areds. Personally I don't think it works any better than the walmart brand. I believe it's big Pharma trying to get Doctors to sell their products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was using another eye support supplement and they manufacturer stopped producing what I was ordering. I found this product when I searched for important ingredients. I've been taking these for a year now and it's effective enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good eye supplement
reviews.reviewText: I like it because of the price, it is a little cheaper the Emerald vision, and has the 2nd best ingredients after Emerald, but it is good for what I need. Emerald vision is the best but the price is outrageous.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best eye supplement
reviews.reviewText: I recently decided to try a new supplement to help support my vision health, and I'm glad I chose Areds 2 Eye Vitamins. This supplement contains an excellent combination of Lutein, Zeaxanthin, and Bilberry Extract, which have been clinically proven to promote eye strain relief, dry eye relief, and overall vision health. The supplement has also won two awards for its effectiveness and quality, so I knew that it was worth trying. Since I started taking Areds 2 Eye Vitamins, I have noticed a significant improvement in my vision. The eye strain and dry eye symptoms seem much more manageable, and I can really tell that my vision is improving. I highly recommend this supplement to anyone looking for a natural way to support their vision health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is improving my vision!
reviews.reviewText: After months of use my vision is improving. The only thing I have for a problem is I get indigestion problems because of the pepper ingredients. I fixed that by eating a meal before taking.
